name: Cry of War / 战争号角
description: Feel the excitement of driving the MarkIV with other WW1 tanks in the Cry of War.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64Bit Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64Bit Processor: i7-2600K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
